Moose::Autobox::Hash(3pm) User Contributed Perl Documentation Moose::Autobox::Hash(3pm)

NAME

Moose::Autobox::Hash - the Hash role

VERSION

version 0.16

SYNOPSIS

  use Moose::Autobox;

  print { one => 1, two => 2 }->keys->join(', '); # prints 'one, two'

DESCRIPTION

This is a role to describes a Hash value.

METHODS

"delete"
"merge"
Takes a hashref and returns a new hashref with right precedence shallow merging.
"hslice"
Slices a hash but returns the keys and values as a new hashref.
"flatten"

Indexed implementation

"at"
"put"
"exists"
"keys"
"values"
"kv"
"slice"
"each"
"each_key"
"each_value"
"each_n_values"
"meta"
"print"
"say"

SUPPORT

Bugs may be submitted through the RT bug tracker <https://rt.cpan.org/Public/Dist/Display.html?Name=Moose-Autobox> (or bug-Moose-Autobox@rt.cpan.org <mailto:bug-Moose-Autobox@rt.cpan.org>).

There is also a mailing list available for users of this distribution, at <http://lists.perl.org/list/moose.html>.

There is also an irc channel available for users of this distribution, at "#moose" on "irc.perl.org" <irc://irc.perl.org/#moose>.
